```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Read in data
```{r}
Papers <- read.csv("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1E835bqD22qPl85Ha8hae8L9j1jM-v6lgBY3Q5d3AboU/pub?gid=1144523609&single=true&output=csv")

Papers$PerkWh <- as.numeric(Papers$PerkWh)
Papers$MW <- as.numeric(Papers$MW)

summary(Papers)


```

Simple meta analysis

```{r}
sampleMeta<-lm(PerkWh~InRPS+ Export+ Firm, data=Papers)

summary(sampleMeta)

```
